short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts candidate data from linkedin profile and submits to Workland Dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app lets you extract potential candidates data from their LinkedIn profiles.  Simply click on Workland logo that appears in the candidate profile landing page and the data will appear in your CRM dashboard.
